column1: #text=It was a day before last Christmas day .
#text=Our house is filled with lights and joy .
#text=On every Christmas day my wife makes very delicious fruit cake .
#text=Everyone who had tasted the cake before asked her the recipe .
#text=We like to have the cake with red wine .
#text=She needs a lot of preparations beforehand to make this cake .
#text=She soaked raisins , nuts , and some dried fruits in rum and kept in an airtight container for 40 days .
#text=After 40 days these fruits absorbed rum and adopted a good flavor .
#text=So she usually starts her cake preparation almost 40 days prior to Christmas .
#text=On Christmas eve she started baking process .
#text=She usually make 5-6 cakes for us and for some friends .
#text=First she prepared caramel syrup to give the cake that dark color .
#text=After that she mixed all purpose flour and baking soda .
#text=We need lots of eggs for preparing the cake .
#text=I helped her in beating the egg white for cake .
#text=After mixing every contents well , she poured the mix into the baking pans and kept it in to the oven and set temperature and time to get it done .
#text=When the oven beeped , she took the baking pan out and kept it aside .
#text=Once it is cooled she packed cakes for friends .
#text=Then she cut our cake and served it with home made red wine .
#text=I can not imagine a Christmas without this cake .
#text=After having the cake , we went to our friends home and distributed the cakes .
